document_data.name: Ansgar Theoderich
document_data.mainbody: Hatemaster '''Ansgar Theoderich''' was a priest of [[Iyachtu Xvim]] that carried on the Godson's faith in the city of [[Phlan]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|79}}
document_data.Activities: Haemaster Ansgar was a priest at the [[Lyceum of the Black Lord]] in Phlan, the temple whose clergy venerated Iyachtu Xvim in what was seen as dissident by the greater [[church of Bane]]. Ansgar preached that Bane truly died during the [[Time of Troubles]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century and that Xvim took on his divine father's form and name in order to garner greater power and more worshipers.
document_data.History: At some point Ansgar was abducted to the [[Lyceum of the Black Hand]] and was tortured by devotees of Bane to divulge these perceived heretical beliefs.
